name: 32. Quest
description:
You play as Ely, a small robot in hold of a mysterious gem that can control time. You are on a mission to collect all the diamonds shattered through 6* levels.

32. Quest is a puzzle-platformer in which you have 30 seconds to complete a level. You have the ability to stop the time anytime. When you stop the time the whole world freezes except you. The timer also freezes, but you cannot move any objects while the time is frozen. 

Your goal in every level is to find a Red and a Blue diamond and to bring them to the end. End of a level is a platform that looks like the one you start the level on.

THE GAME SAVES YOUR PROGRESS IN THE BACKGROUND. TO RETURN TO YOUR PROGRESS GO TO LEVEL SELECT MENU.

*The game currently has 5 levels and isn't as polished as I wanted it to be because  I was on a vacation so I had only half of the jam time to finish it.

Created by Luka Kocić for the Let's Create Game Jam #1

Music generated in:
Abundant Music - https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html

Controls: 
WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
Q - Freeze time
BACKSPACE - Restart level
ESC - Return to main menu
